DOC.brief_summary: The aim with this study is to investigate the effect of statin induced changes in HDL-C on all cause mortality and CVD with adjustment for changes in other blood lipids and clinical parameters in Sweden, UK and the Netherlands.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Statin Treatment Induced HDL Changes
DOC.detailed_description: An observational study of statin treatment induced HDL changes - effect on cardiovascular disease
DOC.criteria: Started treatment with statins within the observation period (20042010) The patient must have valid baseline and followup measurements for HDLC and LDLC. Malignancy Alcohol abuse/alcohol dependence
DOC.keyword: Statin treatment induced HDL changes and the effect on cardiovascular disease
